body:
<!-- This form is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! 

If you're looking for help check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/kubernetes) and the [troubleshooting guide](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/debug-application-cluster/troubleshooting/).
-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

> Uncomment only one, leave it on its own line: 
>
/kind bug
> /kind feature


**What happened**: [ci-kubernetes-e2e-gci-gce-alpha-features](https://k8s-gubernator.appspot.com/builds/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/ci-kubernetes-e2e-gci-gce-alpha-features/) is consistently failing because of PodPreset feature tests, which require settings/v1alpha1, which is no longer enabled by default
```
/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/servicecatalog/podpreset.go:152
Expected error:
    <*errors.StatusError | 0xc421023a70>: {
        ErrStatus: {
            TypeMeta: {Kind: "", APIVersion: ""},
            ListMeta: {SelfLink: "", ResourceVersion: "", Continue: ""},
            Status: "Failure",
            Message: "the server could not find the requested resource (post podpresets.settings.k8s.io)",
            Reason: "NotFound",
            Details: {
                Name: "",
                Group: "settings.k8s.io",
                Kind: "podpresets",
                UID: "",
                Causes: [
                    {
                        Type: "UnexpectedServerResponse",
                        Message: "404 page not found",
                        Field: "",
                    },
                ],
                RetryAfterSeconds: 0,
            },
            Code: 404,
        },
    }
    the server could not find the requested resource (post podpresets.settings.k8s.io)
not to have occurred
/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/servicecatalog/podpreset.go:76
```

**What you expected to happen**: .

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**: .


**Anything else we need to know?**: This was caused by #51839 and kubernetes/test-infra#4699

**Environment**: .
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`): .
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration**: .
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): .
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`): .
- Install tools: .
- Others: .

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Service Catalog.
labels.name: sig/service-catalog

title: PodPreset Feature Tests Consistently Causing ci-kubernetes-e2e-gci-gce-alpha-features to Fail
